name: Ringmaster
overview: Ringmaster is a 1-player mathematics arcade game for the 8-bit Atari computer. The player selects a number, and must then move across a field of elephants by only stepping on those that are a multiple of the number selected. If the player moves to the top of the screen and back, they can chose a new number. If they complete all of the numbers, then they go to a higher challenge with more numbers available. If they miss an elephant or step on the wrong elephant, they must restart the challenge.
